thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Christine Allen

author: Christine Allen
title: Christine Allen
text: I rang rather than book online as I needed some information about which cabins were more suitable for those who are prone to seasickness. My husband and granddaughter have reservations about going on a cruise as they both get seasick in normal boats and ferries. The young man I spoke to was very helpful and well informed and helped me choose a suitable cabin. Being first time cruisers, he told me what to expect and gave me lots of tips on what to take etc. My husband is a lot more settled and is happy to embark on our first ever cruise in a few weeks time.
